sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' const WatchDetail = props => { console.log('watchdetail props: ', props) const returnHide = () => { props.hideWatchlist() } const addCompany = () => { props.addCompany() } const viewCompany = ticker => { props.viewCompany(ticker) } const removeCompany = companyId => { props.removeCompany(props.watchDetail.id, companyId, ) } return (

{props.watchDetail.name}

{props.watchDetail.description}

{props.watchDetail.companies.map((company, index)=>{ return () })}
# Ticker Name Price...
{index + 1} {company.ticker} {company.name}
Current Price: ${Math.round(company.currentPrice * 100) / 100}
Change: {Math.round(((company.currentPrice / company.prevClosePrice) - 1) * 10000) / 100}%
) } export default WatchDetail
